Create a customizable tape dispenser: A tape dispenser that allows users to customize the width and length of the tape they need, making it easier to use and more versatile.
Develop a smart tape dispenser: A tape dispenser that uses sensors to detect when it's running low on tape and automatically reorders from a connected app or website.
Create a portable tape dispenser: A compact and lightweight tape dispenser that can be easily carried and used on the go.
Design a reusable tape dispenser: A tape dispenser that can be refilled multiple times, reducing waste and saving money.
Make a tape dispenser with a built-in cutter: A tape dispenser that includes a built-in cutter, making it easier and more convenient to cut tape to the desired length.
